document_data.name: Briosar Helmsing
document_data.refs1e: Page 29 of ''[[Waterdeep and the North]]'' has Briosar listed as a 5th level [[ranger]]. As ''[[The Savage Frontier]]'' came out later, that book is given precedence.
document_data.mainbody: '''Briosar Helmsing''' was a high [[priest]] [[ranger]] of [[Mielikki]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Between [[1357 DR|1357]] - [[1367 DR]] Briosar operated a shrine to Mielikki in [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] that was known as [[The Lady's Hands]]. Around 1367 DR it joined together with the nearby [[Shrine of Silvanus (Waterdeep)|Shrine of Silvanus]] to form a temple complex known as the [[Shrines of Nature]], which he operated jointly with the other shrine's high priest, [[Anarakin Iriboar]].<ref><ref group="note" name="Temple">The '''Shrines of Nature''' first appear in the ''[[City of Splendors (boxed set)]]'', which is set during [[1367 DR]]. Preceding sourcebooks ''[[City System]]'' ([[1357 DR]]), ''[[Waterdeep and the North]]'', (also 1357 DR), ''[[The Savage Frontier]]'' ([[1358 DR]]), and ''[[Volo's Guide to Waterdeep]]'' ([[1363 DR|1363]] - [[1367 DR]]) all feature the shrines within it as separate and unrelated structures.
